project_abstract.cdata: The project will:  (1) facilitate adequate staffing of the public service, and eliminate staffing redundancies; (2) create conditions for accountability in financial and personnel management, as well as in fundamental public sector operational programs; and (3) support the preparation of a long-term strategy and program for public sector reform.  The project comprises the following three interrelated parts:  (a) reforming the public service salary and employment structure; (b) public sector management strengthening, including components on:  (i) integrated financial management, (ii) the Regional Administrations systems, (iii) personnel management, and (iv) general administration; and (c) a recruitment program.
